          <title>
            <string language="es">Las Espermatofitas, sus características y sus grupos</string>
            <string language="en">Spermatophites, their characteristics and their groups</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spermatophites, ihre Eigenschaften und ihre 
Gruppen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spermatophites, leurs caractéristiques et leurs 
groupes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spermatophites, suas características e seus 
grupos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spermatophites, le loro caratteristiche ed i loro
gruppi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Spermatophites, τα χαρακτηριστικά τους και οι ομάδες
τους</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se analizan las características de las Espermatofitas y los grupos que están incluidos en esta división: Gimnospermas y Angiospermas.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic analysing the characteristics of the spermatophites and the groups which are included in this classification: gymnosperms and angiosperms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Espermatofitas</string>
            <string language="en">spermatophytes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die Eigenschaften der 
spermatophites analysieren und die Gruppen, die in dieser 
Klassifikation eingeschlossen sind: Gymnospermen und 
Angiospermen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet analysant les caractéristiques des 
spermatophites et les groupes qui sont inclus dans cette 
classification : gymnospermes et angiospermes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que analisam as características dos 
spermatophites e os grupos que são incluídos nesta classificação: 
gymnosperms e angiosperms.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che analizzano le caratteristiche degli 
spermatophites ed i gruppi che sono inclusi in questa classificazione:
gimnosperme ed angiosperme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που αναλύει τα χαρακτηριστικά των 
spermatophites και των ομάδων που συμπεριλαμβάνονται σε αυτήν 
την ταξινόμηση: gymnosperms και angiosperms.</string>
          </description>
